title: John Rockman and the Cosmic Brain of Corruption
description: A wicked, deadly and destructive device is being fired across the Universe, killing trillions of innocent people and innocent aliens. To say John Rockman is peeved is the understatement of the light-year! After an unknown enemy kidnaps Maria Ozone, Rockman and Niah must work together to uncover the secrets and get to the bottom of the latest deadly mystery taking over the galaxy cluster! Scoop up a handful of space-popcorn and join John Rockman in his newest adventure! Choke on your space-popcorn as he fights an invisible lizard! Clutch at your throat as he tongue-kisses with Niah! Get the Heimlich from your neighbor as he breaks into a men's locker room! And gasp for air as John Rockman takes on the most destructive device ever created in: John Rockman and the Cosmic Brain of Corruption!
author: Ron Jockman
